A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was great if it was a stand alone and not at all involved in the Star Wars universe. but with how the creators made this film's plot\, it wasn't a really good Star Wars movie. \nFirst off\, Luke would never have done something like that. He would have blamed himself\, but he would never just turn his back on the Jedi Order that he created. \nSecond\, Snoke wouldn't have died that easily.
